start.text: Take their loot when we're done.
That's a fair few supplies floating around out there, how about we take them in?
A fancy one huh? I'll have that.
Time for action, don't break lines.
These guys won't know what hit 'em.

start_boss.text: Even more loot? Delegates will be happy at least.
That's more than I prefer to take on, are we good ya?

retreat.text: Thin line between bravery and stupidity.

out_of_missiles.text: Rocket stocks depleted, do we have any in storage?
We're out of rockets, engaging as normal.

need_help.text: Where's the Duinn fleet when you need it?!

pursuing.text: You should have ponied up when we gave you the chance.
Morons, should have taken the easy way.
I'm sure there's handsomes on there.

running.text: You guys do whatever you want. We outtie.
I think we need to cut losses here. Duinn will get them eventually.

hull_90.text: Now let the real battle begin!
Don't get too excited. It's just beginner's luck.

hull_50.text: I hate that, I hate that so much.

hull_30.text: Let us get out of here! We're hit!
Get the crew in the shuttles, I'll man the ship myself.

overload.text: I'm never going to get used to this.
This is why them mafia types have it easy.

victory.text: It's like watching the Hegemony raid a base then frame us, except it's us this time. Funny that.
Okay, still hoping for more here.
